solution_line_template: He wants to serve {shrimp_per_guest} shrimp per guest and will have {num_guests} guests so he needs {shrimp_per_guest}*{num_guests} = <<{shrimp_per_guest}*{num_guests}={total_shrimp_needed}>>{total_shrimp_needed} shrimp

Each pound of shrimp has {shrimp_per_pound} shrimp and he needs {total_shrimp_needed} shrimp so he needs {total_shrimp_needed}/{shrimp_per_pound} = <<{total_shrimp_needed}/{shrimp_per_pound}={total_pounds_needed}>>{total_pounds_needed} pounds of shrimp

The shrimp is ${price_per_pound}.00 per pound and he needs {total_pounds_needed} pounds so he will spend {price_per_pound}*{total_pounds_needed} = $<<{price_per_pound}*{total_pounds_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on shrimp
